definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
to ferment/to brew/to make honey (of bees)/to lead to/to form gradually/wine/stuffed vegetables (cooking method)
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Some years Non-Vintage can be more fun.
sentences.chinese: 一些年頭，非葡萄酒釀造會更有趣。

sentences.english: At Kendall-Jackson we create exciting wines for all wine lovers to discover.
sentences.chinese: 在肯德傑克遜我們爲葡萄酒愛好者釀造了精彩的酒。

sentences.english: Brewing industry is one of the main pollution sources in Huaihe River valley.
sentences.chinese: 釀造業是淮河流域的主要污染源之一。

sentences.english: Small batch vodka alembic distilled from local grain and the spring water.
sentences.chinese: 這種限量伏特加採用當地的穀物和泉水釀造。

sentences.english: Preliminary study on stability of bramble pigment;
sentences.chinese: 對黑莓幹酒釀造工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: The chrysanthemum flower wine is unique in brewing.
sentences.chinese: 菊花酒的釀造十分獨特。

sentences.english: Setting a new record for brewed extravagance, Vintage Nr.
sentences.chinese: 設置一個奢侈的釀造，葡萄酒星期日新紀錄。

sentences.english: Made with incredible finesse and balance, this semi-dry wine finishes crisp and clean.
sentences.chinese: 經精心釀造，這款半乾型酒回味酥脆乾爽。

sentences.english: At the same time put forward the technology flow of today's browing sauce production.
sentences.chinese: 同時提出了現代釀造醬油調配生產的工藝流程。

sentences.english: The stylistic vision of this wine is an "Oregon version" of Alsatian Pinot Gris.
sentences.chinese: 此款酒用俄勒岡產阿爾薩斯白皮諾釀造。

sentences.english: How much water goes into a barrel of beer?
sentences.chinese: 釀造一桶啤酒需要多少水？

sentences.english: In New World, many vines are brewed only with Merlot.
sentences.chinese: 在新世界，很多酒都是用單一的梅樂來釀造的。

sentences.english: They brew the best beer in the world and yet seem to care nothing about business.
sentences.chinese: 他們釀造出世界頂級啤酒，卻對這項買賣淡然處之。

sentences.english: When business was good, the brewery employed 20 people.
sentences.chinese: 在生意好的時候，這家釀造廠曾經僱傭過20人。

sentences.english: Mirin is a transparent, sweet cooking wine made from glutinous rice, frequently used in Japanese cooking.
sentences.chinese: 米林酒是糯米釀造的，常用於日本烹飪的透明甜米酒。

sentences.english: Icewine is the use of frozen wine grapes.
sentences.chinese: 冰酒，是用冰凍的葡萄釀造的酒。

definition: to produce (by natural growth, or by manufacture, mining etc)/to yield/to turn out/produce/products
to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
Kavalan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan/old name of Yilan 宜蘭|宜兰 county, Taiwan/Kavalan, a brand of single malt whisky from Taiwan
to taste a small amount/to sample
